mapper.select:
select
from sys_redo where status = 0 and auto_redo_able = true limit 10
select count(1) from sys_redo where (status = 2 or (status =0 and auto_redo_able = false )) and create_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE)
